name: Egg Marketing & Public Relations
tag_list: public-relations, press-release, social-media, internet-marketing, facebook, twitter
overview:
Egg Marketing & Public Relations connect brands with customers. The company uses social media, internet marketing, blogs and PR to create conversations with them on its clients’ behalf. Some of the Marketing 2.0 tools Egg uses to help grow business include:

Marketing Consultation Facebook Twitter Blog Giveaways & Reviews Email Campaigns Press Releases
